column1: 0$Condition: Major Depressive Disorder$8/18/2014 6:30:45 PM$Reviewer: fire godess
column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient) $5$3$5$"Have been on this medication for about 20 yrs. now. It worked on day one for me - noticed an immediate change. For that reason
column3: I've never considered changing. I did experience weight gain (which for females is kind of depressing on it's own). I definately experienced loss of libido and that's been disturbing to me. It is for these reasons that I'm considering changing to another anti-depressant. But this will work!

column1: 1$Condition: Major Depressive Disorder$2/10/2009 9:42:54 AM$Reviewer: 19-24 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient) $1$1$3$I took this medication for 3 months and went crazy! it made me so angry that i was punching walls, yelling at my family, kicking doors and just a complete asshole! This medication did not help the depression, made it ten times worse! I advised my dr and she threatened to commit me if i stopped using it! i stopped anyway and was fine! HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!
